programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Ben Affleck & Jennifer Lopez: Together Again
programme.desc: Prior to getting back with JLo, Ben Afflecks life had been nothing short of TRAGIC... Why was Jennifer Garner completely fed up with him? And how did Ben almost DESTROY his family?

programme.title: Naomi Campbell & Nelson Mandella: Defending A Model
programme.desc: Supermodel Naomi Campbell was one of the most in-demand models of her time, but when the violent side of Naomi came out, she faced 7 years in prison! Then... Nelson Mandela stepped in to teach her a powerful lesson. Why did Nelson Mandela defend the world’s most controversial model?

programme.title: Britney Spears: Finally Free
programme.desc: Britney Spears ESCAPED her conservatorship but she still has ONE FIGHT LEFT! She﻿ tried to tell the world what her family kept secret for 13 years, but her father threatened her. In this video, their dark secrets are finally REVEALED.

programme.title: Geri & Mel B: Spicy Secrets
programme.desc: Behind The Secret Geri Halliwell and Mel B Hid for Years: While the world was busy obsessing over the SPICE GIRLS, behind the scenes, two members were also bonding in a spicy way! What REALLY caused ﻿Geri Halliwell to leave the group? And why did she break Mel ﻿Bs heart? This video reveals a side of Ginger and Scary Spice you never knew about.

programme.title: Kourtney & Scott: Family Breakdown
programme.desc: It took 10 YEARS of fighting and heartbreaks for ﻿Kourtney Kardashian to FINALLY walk away from her ex, Scott Disick. She then fell MADLY IN LOVE with musician Travis Barker, and that made Scott absurdly JEALOUS! Why did Kourtneys family CONTINUE to be supportive of Scott despite his toxic behavior?

programme.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger: Rebuilding Family
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger was forced to be tough at an early age. Abused by his father, Arnold tried to bury his painful past by putting all of his energy into bodybuilding. When he started a family with his wife, everything appeared perfect to the outside world... Until Arnold was publicly exposed for cheating on his wife and destroying his family. Why did Arnold cheat? And how far back do the lies go?

programme.title: Mark Ruffalo & Jennifer Garner: Support In Friendship
programme.desc: One night, Mark Ruffalo woke up SOBBING from a terrible nightmare. He dreamed he received a medical diagnosis FROM HELL, which later became true! His resilience was put to the test. But why did he choose to hide the tragic news from his wife? And what did co-star Jennifer Garner think of him on the set of "13 going on 30"?

programme.title: Jane Fonda Vs. The US Government
programme.desc: Actress Jane Fonda took the public by surprise when she was photographed overseas for her activism. When Nixon found out, Jane became target enemy #1 and the country called her “despicable”. Why was the President suspicious of Jane’s motives? And how did Jane Fonda fight back?

programme.title: Dwyane Wade's Fight to Support his Kids
programme.desc: This is how Dwyane Wades custody battle from hell against ex-wife forced him to show up BETTER.

programme.title: Janet Jackson Breaks Her Silence
programme.desc: Janet Jackson reveals the haunting story of how she was treated unfairly in Hollywood after the Super Bowl mishap with Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: Halsey: The Road To Motherhood
programme.desc: Living with bipolar disorder, singer Halsey went from suicidal and living on the streets to becoming a Grammy-nominated artist. Now, Halsey opens up about their painful condition, and how AGAINST ALL ODDS they were able to live their dream life of becoming a mother.

programme.title: Travis and Kourtney: Better for the Kids
programme.desc: Legendary rock star and Blink-182 member Travis Barkers biggest fear came true when in 2008 he survived the impossible... his plane crashed and caught fire. He was one of the lucky two to survive. After fighting for his life in the hospital, he fell into a suicidal spiral taking his family and children down with him, until he realized an important truth. ﻿﻿Will his new relationship with Kourtney Kardashian survive his dark past and who predicted the plane crash before it even happened?

programme.title: Dave Bautista: Breaking Out of the Box
programme.desc: Desperate to make a change in his life, Dave Bautista left his brutal childhood behind to become a wrestler. But when the WWE denied Dave from pursuing his biggest dream, everything started breaking down. Why did Dave walk away from a successful career in the WWE? And why did John Cena make everything worse?

programme.title: A Lost Husband
programme.desc: This stay-at-home mom has had it enough with her husband taking her for granted. When an unexpected turn of events puts him in a bad spot, he has no choice but to face the extent of his arrogance.

programme.title: "Expensive Retirements, Life Insurance, and Kathy Ireland"
programme.desc: Sailing off into the sunset could mean a very expensive retirement...Ric Edelman explains why; Who really needs life insurance? And an interview with Kathy Ireland - how she went from being a super model to a super mogul.

programme.title: Power-Up The Compound Effect
programme.desc: For many, just starting to save money can be a difficult step. If you wait until all of your bills are paid, often there just isnt anything left to put away. But if you look at the benefits of saving, even just a little over time, the payoff can be dramatic. Its called the financial compound effect. Focus on paying off your high-interest debt, but get in the habit of saving as soon as possible. Give yourself the gift of time to maximize the compound effect on your investments and watch your wealth grow. Power it up and starting today!

programme.title: "Taxable Income, Dividends, Roth & SMA: What's Missing in Your Early Retirement?"
programme.desc: "What are the pros and cons if Chip uses the money in his taxable brokerage account for early retirement income? Jack and Sally ask Joe and Big Al to spitball on whether they can retire around age 55 or 60, and whether they should max out their Roth or convert to Roth, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 527 with Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, April and Andy ask the fellas to spitball on their dividend investing strategy, and Don wonders if a separately managed account (SMA) makes sense for his taxable account. (Well also find out what an SMA is.)"

programme.title: "Why UPS Drivers Make $170,000 Per Year And You DON'T"
programme.desc: "UPS drivers are grabbing headlines across the country for being awarded salaries of ONE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY thousand dollars [$170,000] a year for doing deliveries. It sounds amazing but if this is even true, its a good news story covering up a trend that has cost you dearlyThere is a reason these delivery drivers are making six figures and you ARENT. So its time to learn How Money Works to find out if delivery drivers earning one hundred and seventy thousand dollars a year should be the new normal instead of grabbing headlines."

programme.title: The (Idiotic) Rise of Billionaire Doomsday Bunkers
programme.desc: "In a game of Survival of the richest, people like Zuckerberg, Peter Theil, Sam Altman and the former CEO of Reddit have all reportedly invested tens of millions of dollars in lavish accommodation to wait out the end times… These are just the ones we know about, in a game where discretion is obviously a big advantage."

The Length Of Time: Inside The Tour Divide
programme.desc: The Tour Divide is a 2750 mile (4400 km) unsupported mountain bike race from Banff, Canada to Antelope Wells on the Mexican border. The Length of Time documents the race from a rider’s perspective telling the story of Josh Ibbett’s ride. See the emotional highs and lows of this classic bikepacking race from the inside.

programme.title: Russia SD
programme.desc: Sage Cattabriga-Alosa, Victoria Jealouse, Chris Collins, and Micah Black adventure through Russia. Despite friction with the government, and a string of questionable characters, the crew conquers Europe’s highest peak.

programme.title: Canoe Tripping In Killarney Provincial Park
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: The Far North
programme.desc: Join TGR and Anthill Films on an adventure to the frigid north, where bikers will attempt to bring world-class tricks to a frozen and glaciated landscape while filming for unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: Tulsequah, BC SD
programme.desc: Tag along as the crew sets up in the wilderness of Tulsequah, BC. Utilizing the expertise of some of the world’s foremost big mountain riders, the crew researches first ascents through potentially dangerous terrain.

programme.title: Grand Teton
programme.desc: Jeremy Jones heads to Jackson Hole to attempt to ride the Otterbody in Teton Park. Jeremy and the Teton Gravity Research team will face the harrowing climb to the summit of the Grand Teton.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the Rideau Canal - Part 1
programme.desc: A UNESCO world heritage site, the Rideau Canal runs through the heart of Canada’s capital city of Ottawa. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he takes a different approach to see the canal by exploring a larger section of the 126-mile waterway by houseboat and kayak.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge is a short documentary about a group of surfers trying to make surfboards out of ice. It follows the process from freezing the boards, shaping them and taking them out into the sea. There is a lot of trying and failing. Will it work at all? The boards are slippery, and they melt very fast. Everything needs to work simultaneously: The surfers must be ready. The boards cannot crack. The perfect wave must come. Ice Edge is a film where nature and people play together.

programme.title: Tubak Toyota Rally
programme.desc: The rally features a challenging three-day desert route with a timed distance of around 419 kilometers.

programme.title: FIA Formula 4 Cup
programme.desc: Open-wheel racing featuring young drivers in identical Formula 4 cars.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Stock1000
programme.desc: Big bikes, big passes, and big stakes—Stock 1000 Race 2 at Road America delivered non-stop thrills.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Motovation Supersport
programme.desc: Race 2 in Supersport brought even more drama to Road America, with riders dicing for position and championship momentum on the line.

programme.title: Moss Trophy
programme.desc: A race for closed-cockpit GT cars from before 1963, including the Jaguar E-type, Ferrari 250 SWB, and Aston Martin DB4GT, evoking the golden era of GT racing.

programme.title: GT3 Shoot Out
programme.desc: A two-part race for homologated saloon cars over 2.8 liters from 1970 to 1982. Vehicles like the Ford Capri Mk3, Rover SD1, and Chevrolet Camaro Z28 provided thrilling touring car action.

programme.title: Michelin 12H Spa-Francorchamps
programme.desc: The legendary Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps hosts 12 hours of non-stop endurance racing action. Watch GT and touring car teams battle through the Ardennes in a dramatic test of speed, strategy, and stamina.

Weekly episodes feature various themes, and feature two main projects and one shorter technique segment. Some projects include monogramming napkins and towels; baby poncho, hooded towel and baby-friendly diapers; embellishing yoga pants with a clothing tattoo; and sewing on knits.

programme.title: THE SHIFTING
programme.desc: Marcela, a young Latina, is forced to flee when her family refuses to believe that her cousin raped her. Her world is ripped to pieces when she sees Joseph, her rapist, and a respected city councilman, on the news. She is grown up now and living in LA with her devoted boyfriend, Manny, who is living a clean life after years in a gang. When Manny finds out, he attempts to kill Joseph, and Marcela has to choose: get revenge or forgive the past and begin healing. This transformative film takes a realistic look at the lives we are given and the choices we make.

programme.title: THE GIRL IN THE MIRROR
programme.desc: After moving into her new off campus home and passing the inspection of her odd landlord, Alix discovers an antique mirror in her basement that contains the spirit of a dead teen that soon unleashes an onslaught of strange occurrences through out the house such as terrifying noises from behind locked doors, ghostly images, and even dead animals! With the aide of her classmates she sets out to find the secret the house holds about her and its former inhabitant, which leads her to a startling revelation that leads to mayhem and disaster.

programme.title: NOTHING LEFT
programme.desc: After Lukes wife finds out about his affair, Luke trys to save his marriage by taking his family on a camping trip. Luke and his family becomes the hunted. He feels hes lost it all, he has to fight, or hell have NOTHING LEFT! This film is a heart pounding action filled movie. It will leave you breatless, once you get off of the emotional roller-coaster.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 22
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 21
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Tika Pila Thriller
programme.desc: Bella the mouse is trying hard to balance a huge pile of books just when Mewmew zooms by making Bella trip on a pebble. So she continues walking forward in reverse mode. She is so engrossed in her new walking mode that she bumps into Deedee making her books fall all over the place. On Deedee’s query as to what new learning Bella was into, they start discussing about Tika Pila and their joined curiosity to know more about the secretive creature by asking everybody in Abra-Dabra what they know about Tika Pila. Charlie seems to know a little, but the Doobydoos are too scared to even speak about her. But Bella is determined to know all she can about Tika Pila and sets off all geared for the expedition. She is scared out of her wits by the sudden and loud hooting of Tika Pila she runs for her life and slips to a halt right in front of Deedee and Nino. Almost when Bella is about to give up her Tika Pila discovery project, Deedee encourages her by helping Bella with some magic. Deedee casts a spell to help Bella get close enough to study Tika Pila. Strengthened by the spell, Bella gives one more try. Deedee and friends soon spot Tika Pila at town-hall. But as they admire how wonderful Tika Pila looks as she eats cacti flowers they hear her hoot very differently. Bella opines that the hoots are successively different because Tika Pila wants to go back home. Just then the Doodbydoos pass by and Tika Pila follows them. Deedee comes up with a plan to lure Tika Pila back to her home by getting the Doobydoos to follow Mayor De Pfeffle holding out a plate stacked with their favourite custard sandwiches. Deedee and Bella lay cacti flowers as well for Tika Pila to follow. On seeing the wide open cacti fields Tika Pila gives a loud and happy toot and makes a run for it. Bella is so happy that she decides that something as wonderful, mystical and magical as Tika Pila shouldn’t be studied.

programme.title: CAKE PE CHAI
programme.desc: Its Poodles birthday today and Sundar has planned to prepare the perfect cake for poodle Aaloo Paratha Cake with Chai Frosting but he has to do this while he is also taking care of the Hotel Californias demanding customers. And Chai Raja should not find this out. Ingredients are in place, Sundar is ready to bake and Basha is also ready with a surprise for sundar which is making sure that the cake is never baked. Will the cake be baked?

programme.title: Dunky's Day in
programme.desc: Dunky has high fever and cannot tolerate any kind of noise. Cat has not had lunch as Dunky is sick… Keet fools him a lot by offering empty glasses for water..

programme.title: AMAZING FLYING MONKEY SHARKS
programme.desc: Victor and CeCe purchase a Grow Your Own Pets, kit at a local flea market. As the Creepy Candy are sweltering because of the broken air conditioner temptation gets the best of them. Disappointment turns into mayhem when the Creepy Candy dive into the mix! Will the pets come to life? Will the library be trashed? Tune in to the next episode to find out!

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: Friendfest Festival
programme.desc: Friendfest is about to be ruined when the Smighties get the Switcherozee Surprise from the Villains and switch personalities. They get the ultimate lesson in friendship when theyl learn to appreciate each other and defeat Sneevil and Biggs.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: CHARMED, I SAY
programme.desc: Sundar is flipping through old film magazines in his break time when he hears a shriek from right outside the tea shop. Leaning out he sees a woman point at something just at the door. Chai Raja swoops out and in a deft move ensnares whatever it was in a rat-trap. He hands over the small harmless trap to Sundar. Sundar takes the trap and opens it only to find a small benign rattlesnake (female at that!) glide out. The female snake has a fixation on Sundar and follows him back to the hotel, causing havoc in the hotel. For once Sundar has an ally against Basha, but the obsessive snake is more a bane than a boon as Chai Raja is in danger of losing all its customers. Sundar must now tactfully rid the simpering snake off before he too is forced to slither out of the tea shop once and for all.

programme.title: CHOR MACHAYE SHOR
programme.desc: Chai Raja is down with fever and needs to rest. He gives Sundar the charge of the tea stall on 2 conditions; one, he will make sure the customers get their orders on time and second he mustnt be disturbed. Basha overhears it and is enthralled. Sundar is ready for the assignment and so is Basha. Hapless Sundar has to struggle and juggle himself between his hungry customers, his sleeping master and fighting the villain of his life-BASHA.

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: SUNDAR SANTA
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Chai Raja makes Sundar lug in a mini-tree as a decorative centrepiece for the special day (decorations are beautifully coloured snacks on a tree made of green chillies). His job profile also includes handing out small gifts from below the tree to the regular patrons of the shop. Sundar loyally goes on with his chores trying his best to sweeten up the Chai experience for the clientele with his Christmassy cheer. Basha, feeling some of the joy of giving himself, decides to give Sundar off from chasing and turns up at the shop with merely the intention of watching the celebration. Sundar however pranks Basha with a rigged gift giving the latter a sore spot on his behind. Now it is officially revenge and Basha decides to spoil Sundars day. What follows next is when Basha comes in various Christmas diguises as a variety of santas, as einderretc thus stealing the gifts, food and also making Sundars life a living hell. The Christmas is not emrry anymore for Sundar.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mysterious stranger_1
programme.desc: The stranger walks thru the old library, snapping pictures and making notes all the while mumbling incoherently under his breath, when He stops and rings a bell.he Creepy Candy decide to have the Hooligan J. Beans follow Mr. Dark into the bathroom. They hide and watch. as he goes to the sink and removes his glasses and looks in the mirror.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: TRAPPED
programme.desc: Sundar is chucking the peels and rubbish (after a mild run-in with Basha) into a compost pit when he notices a queer little sapling with a lovely bud like flower. When Sundar tickles the bud, the plant twitches as if responding to the touch. Intrigued, Sundar scoops up the sapling to a coconut shell and brings it to the hotel but is quickly divested off it as Chai Raja ushers him to clean up before turning in. Chai Raja sloshes his special night brew and some spills onto the plant. The plant shudders unnoticed by anyone, the brew boosting its growth so quickly...that by morning when Sundar wakes up he shrieks to find a massive venus fly trap in place of the small fragile sapling he had left the night before. Chai Raja though does freak out in the beginning does let Sundar keep the huge plant pet once he sees its adeptness at keeping the tables clean off flies, especially when rewarded with sips of tea! Basha finding the plant extremely quirky pranks it with pepper seeds and thats it. The plant now breathing fire chases after Basha himself. And Sundar is thrilled at first, but then things fly wrong as the plant starts wrecking the hotel. It is literally a war in the hotel and Sundar is at his wits end, so is Chai Raja. But Basha is having a good time, though the plant is impartial even towards Basha. Going into magic space.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: WANTED
programme.desc: The street circus from which Basha escaped, returns to the village. And they see Basha running all around Hotel California. And they decide to get their ex-star attraction at any cost. Now Sundar teams up with the circus guys to catch Basha once and for all. The circus guys are putting up a really hilarious show trying to catch Basha; with Sundars silly attempts in between. But Basha is too smart for all of them. At last the circus guys run away for their dear lives!!!

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Coin
programme.desc: What to do with all that spare change? Hepi and Briko have an idea for you

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Time stood still
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world in which time is stuck: they have to find the original grandfather clock to which the pendulum belongs and fix it.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: One of these days
programme.desc: The twins help a nervous Tortoise -whose only friend is a face drawn on a rock-to find the courage to make friends.

programme.title: Slow down in tempo town
programme.desc: The twins are in a city where everyone lives in a frantic manner. They run fast from here and there, talking so fast that you do not understand anything. They must find a way to re-establish in the city a liveable rhythm

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Biggerish
programme.desc: Maple is tired of being small, but when she eats the fruit of the Biggle Tree in atop Zoonihorn Mountain, she grows so big, she becomes a destructive giant!. Be careful what you wish for; persevere, no matter what the problem.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: Frozen Smighty Day
programme.desc: The Super Six are enjoying Frozen Smighty Day until Monster Birds threaten Smightyland. Its up to Dude and Melody to work together to get Nardys Freeze Ray back from Sneevils underground lair.

programme.title: Me-tal Magnet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: Unlucky Fred
programme.desc: Fred relies on his lucky dice for every decision. At a theme park, he loses them, and has trouble coping without them. Along the way he also loses Friday! Fred has to rely on more than luck to get them both back.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Let's Go Camping~
programme.desc: Friends are camping today. Sitting around the campfire, they decide to grill some sausages. Scot goes to look for them in their hiding place, but theyre not there! Friends believe that Scot is up to his old tricks and has hidden them for himself. They remind him of the last time he hid food... and it turns out that it was the same day the gang met Duda for the first time. Admitting that he wasnt the one eating the snacks he had hidden then, Scot begins to tell his friends what really happened that day. And it looks like a cute little mole that lives underground may have been the unwitting culprit.

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: Fairy Dust_Based On Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: In the tale of Sleeping Beauty, the Prince kisses the Princess, expecting her to finally awaken from her long sleep. But, against all the odds, the Princess sleeps on. SANDRA, assisted by FO, discovers that the Princess’s lips are covered in magic dust. One of the characters in the tale of Sleeping Beauty does not want the princess to ever wake up

programme.title: Stitch in Time
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the "Sneezils flu," all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Brother Ogre – Puss In Boots Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called out by his fiancée, a very refined cat who is the pet of the PRINCESS in the story. The wedding between the MARQUIS OF CARABAS and the PRINCESS is very close, but the MARQUIS and his CAT have disappeared. SANDRA and FO go to the OGRE’s castle in which the quick-witted cat and his master now live, and discover that a second OGRE, the brother of the first one, who PUSS IN BOOTS ate after convincing him to turn himself into a mouse, has imprisoned inside the castle.

programme.title: Viudo
programme.desc: Una tormenta mortal demuestra a Vera que hasta una tragedia es capaz de regalar el amor a dos almas rotas.

programme.title: Mi hija y yo
programme.desc: ¿Se puede ser papá a tiempo completo y policía al mismo tiempo? Doruk tendrá que comprobarlo por sí mismo

programme.title: La novia de mi prometido
programme.desc: Julia no quiso dejar la ciudad para irse detrás de su novio, pero nadie lo pudo reemplazar.

programme.title: Sabah Al Arabiya
programme.desc: Start the day afresh with Al Arabiya’s morning show, equipping viewers with social and cultural news, a regional press review and sports and weather updates.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Imarat Al Masjid Al Nabawi
programme.desc: Al Arabiya explores the architectural history of Al Masjid Al Nabawi, showcasing the various stages of its construction and expansions.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Ma’alim Al Hajj
programme.desc: A programme dedicated to documenting prominent religious and historical sites that witnessed the greatest events during the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Balloon Land-1935
programme.desc: The inhabitants, including the trees and rocks, of Balloon Land are made entirely of balloons. They come under attack from the evil Pincushion Man. With the help of a quickly inflated army, they manage to fend off the attack.

programme.title: There's Good Boos Tonight 1948
programme.desc: Casper makes friends with a fox cub. But the new friendship is threatened when a fox hunter and his two hounds come on the scene.

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: In the Bag-1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry crash their plane in the cartoon wild, wild west. Surreal hi-jinx involving a vicious outlaw and robbery ensue.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Robinhood Makes Good 1939
programme.desc: Three little squirrels act out the story of Robin Hood. A fox, thinking he can make a meal out of them, joins in. The squirrels have to find a way to get rid of the fox.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: Crowing Pains 1947
programme.desc: Foghorn convinces Henery that Sylvester is a chicken. Foghorn sticks Henery in an egg and sticks it under Sylvester.

programme.title: Goo Goo Goliath 1954
programme.desc: An inebriated stork must deliver a baby to a giant at the top of a beanstalk, but doesn't feel like flying that high and instead delivers the baby to a normal-sized couple, who try to raise the giant tot as their own.

programme.title: The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: The Playful Polar Bears-1938
programme.desc: A joyfully contented group of polar bears encounter danger when hunters arrive.

programme.title: Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words "THE END."

programme.title: to duck or not to duck (1920x1080)
Lights Fantastic 1942
programme.desc: A tour of the bright lights of New York City, where the various advertising signs come to life.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: Manhattan Love Song-1934
programme.desc: After having been swindled out of all their money by a crooked business manager, formerly wealthy socialites Jerry and Carol discover that they owe their chauffeur and maid back wages they are unable to pay. They're forced to let their former employees live in their luxury apartment in lieu of paying the money they owe them.

programme.title: Back Stage-1919
programme.desc: Working their fingers to the bone to prepare the set for an upcoming performance, the enthusiastic stagehands, Roscoe and Buster, find themselves on stage when the cast quits. However, is will alone enough to earn a big round of applause?

programme.title: The Fatal Glass of Beer 1933
programme.desc: The prodigal son of a Yukon prospector comes home on a night that "ain't fit for man nor beast.

programme.title: The Golf Specialist 1930
programme.desc: J. Effingham Bellweather plays golf despite many slapstick setbacks

programme.title: Those Love Pangs -1914
programme.desc: Charlie and a rival vie for the favors of their landlady. In the park they each fall for different girls, though Charlie's has a male friend already. Charlie considers suicide, is talked out of it by a policeman, and later throws his girl's friend into the lake. Frightened, the girls go off to a movie. Charlie shows up there and flirts with them. Later both rivals substitute themselves for the girls and attack the unwitting Charlie. In an audience-wide fight, Charlie is tossed through the screen.

programme.title: His Wedding Night 1917
programme.desc: In a drugstore Al and Roscoe are rivals for Alice. Roscoe slings melons and operates the gas pump. Buster delivers a wedding gown for Alice, begins modeling it, is mistaken for Alice and is kidnapped by Al.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV - TULUM (MEXICO)
programme.desc: Explora la magia de Tulum con Leo Saleh en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV ( VIAJE EN CRUCERO !! ) MSC CRUCEROS
programme.desc: En el programa de hoy te mostramos nuestro viaje en un exclusivo crucero junto a la empresa MSC , estuvimos presentes en la temporada inaugural de Grandiosa. El espectacular MSC Grandiosa, con capacidad para 6.300 huéspedes, 2.421 cabinas y 19 cubiertas, presume de un diseño moderno y sorprendente y de una gran cantidad de experiencias e instalaciones que llevarán su viaje al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: FASHION DISTRICT: ¿Dónde y cómo INVERTIR EN MIAMI 2025? Mejores zonas, oportunidades y tips para el Real Estate
SHE RESONATES: Brenda Carrasco
programme.desc:
Chicas Guapas TV presenta SHE RESONATES, un nuevo programa que amplifica las voces de mujeres en la industria de la música, destacando sus trayectorias, desafíos y logros.
En este primer episodio, Dakyta entrevista a Brenda Carrasco, vicepresidenta de marketing y estrategia artística en Warner Music Latina. Brenda comparte su inspirador camino desde México hasta Estados Unidos, los retos de ser inmigrante en la industria y cómo logró posicionarse en un rol de liderazgo dentro de una de las compañías discográficas más influyentes del mundo.
No te pierdas esta conversación llena de aprendizaje y motivación para todas aquellas que buscan dejar huella en la música.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.
